attributes.action: censure the Home Secretary for rejecting scientific advice for reasons of political expediency.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Home Secretary needs publicly reprimanding for rejecting scientific advice for reasons of political expediency

This is a rerun of the Yes Minister episode "The Greasy Pole" where Jim Hacker also rejected scientific advice for political expediency.   Unlike the Home Secretary, Jim Hacker was honest enough to admit it.

The Home Secretary has potentially created a situation where no qualified person may volunteer to advise the government as they may be asked to resign if they do not give the answers that the government wants.

This could mean that decisions  requiring scientific knowledge may have to be taken by those not qualified to do so.
